data.text: Ame kae nye esi gbɔna tso Bozra le Edom,
Nu ka ta wò awuwo biã abe
elabena hlɔ̃biaŋkeke le nye dzi me,
Metsa ŋku, ke ame aɖeke meli
Mefanya dukɔwo le nye dziku me.
Eya hã xaxa le woƒe xaxawo katã me,
gake wodze aglã hedo dziku na eƒe Gbɔgbɔ Kɔkɔe la,
Tete eƒe dukɔ la ɖo ŋku blemaŋkekeawo dzi,
ame si dɔ eƒe ŋutikɔkɔe ƒe alɔ ƒe ŋusẽ
eye wòkplɔ wo to gogloƒe la le?
Abe nyi si wokplɔ yina ɖe gbeɖuƒe ene la,
Bi kɔ tso dziƒo, eye nàkpɔ nu tso wò
O! Yehowa, nu ka ta nèna míetra tso wò
Ɣeyiɣi kpui aɖe koe wò teƒe,
Tɔwòwoe míenye tso blema ke, gake woawo la,
